articles.author: Chris Mooney
articles.title: Greenland ice sheet set to raise sea levels by nearly a foot, study finds
articles.description: Human-driven climate change has set in motion massive ice losses in Greenland that couldn’t be halted even if the world stopped emitting greenhouse gases today, according to a new study published Monday.
articles.content:

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Today's Artemis I launch has been scrubbed after engine issue
articles.description: The Artemis I launch has been scrubbed after the team was unable to work through an issue on one of the rocket's four engines.
articles.content:
Kennedy Space Center, Florida (CNN)The launch of NASA's historic Artemis I moon mission has been postponed after the team was unable to work through an issue with one of the rocket's four engines.

articles.title: UN agency to inspect Ukraine nuclear plant in urgent mission
articles.description: KYIV (AP) — A U.N. nuclear watchdog team set off on an urgent mission Monday to safeguard the Russian-occupied Zaporizhzhia atomic power plant  at the heart of fighting in Ukraine, a long-awaited trip the world hopes will help avoid a radioactive catastrophe.
